description:
A successful architecture that depicts the relationship between the energy market engineering requirements and blockchain requirements
(shown as enablers). Software includes sequential and relational architectures supported by the UML flow diagrams. For a successful blockchain agnostic implementation of energy markets, the proposed architecture/blueprint supported by prototype implementation is very efficient. The proposed invention also depicts various means of the use of
blockchain technology for energy market systems.
name: Blockchain smart contracts for energy markets

permissions.exemptionText: This source code is restricted by patent and / or intellectual property law.
